overview: Sexpert drag queen Gloria Hole hosts this informative sexumentary all about the high-quality glory holes in the City of Angels. Steve Pierce is a kid in a candy store when he goes to The Barracks and meets Justin Woods and Doug Jeffries. Then, Brad Davis introduces Matt Bradshaw to the cruisy stalls of beachfront rest stops. Next, those in the know attend an athletic event where there's a secret glory hole area behind the lockers.
title: Glory Holes of L.A.
